tool_description:
DataDome Captcha Solver
Read this blog: https://www.capsolver.com/blog/how-to-solve-datadome
And this documentation: https://docs.capsolver.com/guide/antibots/datadome.html
You will be able to solve DataDome captcha without effort using Capsolver API.
name: Datadome-Solver
title: Datadome-Solver

api_list.name: Get Task Result
api_list.description: Get the result of capsolver create task
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://datadome-solver1.p.rapidapi.com/api.capsolver.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "datadome-solver1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
